00005     DetectorID::~DetectorID() {
00006         // Delete the field list and its objects as we assume this class owns it.
00007         for (IDField::IDFieldList::iterator it = fieldList_->begin(); it != fieldList_->end(); it++) {
00008             delete (*it);
00009         }
00010         delete fieldList_;
00011     }
00012 
00013     DetectorID::DetectorID() : rawValue_(0), fieldList_(0) {
00014     }

00016     DetectorID::DetectorID(IDField::IDFieldList* fieldList) : rawValue_(0) {
00017         setFieldList(fieldList);
00018         init();
00019     }

00021     DetectorID::RawValue DetectorID::getRawValue() {
00022         return rawValue_;
00023     }

00025     void DetectorID::setRawValue(RawValue rawValue) {
00026         this->rawValue_ = rawValue;
00027     }

00029     const DetectorID::FieldValueList& DetectorID::unpack() {
00030         std::fill(fieldValues_.begin(), fieldValues_.end(), 0);
00031         for (IDField::IDFieldList::iterator it = fieldList_->begin();
00032                 it != fieldList_->end(); it++) {
00033             IDField* field = (*it);
00034             unsigned result = (field->getBitMask() & rawValue_) >> field->getStartBit();
00035             this->fieldValues_[field->getIndex()] = result;
00036         }
00037         return this->fieldValues_;
00038     }
00039 
00040     DetectorID::RawValue DetectorID::pack() {
00041         rawValue_ = 0;
00042         for (IDField::IDFieldList::iterator it = fieldList_->begin();
00043                 it != fieldList_->end(); it++) {
00044             IDField* field = (*it);
00045             unsigned fieldValue = fieldValues_[field->getIndex()];
00046             rawValue_ = rawValue_ | (fieldValue << field->getStartBit());
00047         }
00048         return rawValue_;
00049     }
00050 
00051     DetectorID::FieldValue DetectorID::getFieldValue(int i) {
00052         return fieldValues_[i];
00053     }
00054 
00055     void DetectorID::setFieldValue(int i, FieldValue val) {
00056         fieldValues_[i] = val;
00057     }

00059     void DetectorID::setFieldValue(const std::string& fieldName, FieldValue fieldValue) {
00060         fieldValues_[fieldMap_[fieldName]->getIndex()] = fieldValue;
00061     }

00063     IDField::IDFieldList* DetectorID::getFieldList() {
00064         return fieldList_;
00065     }

00067     IDField* DetectorID::getField(const std::string& fieldName) {
00068         return fieldMap_[fieldName];
00069     }
00070 
00071     DetectorID::FieldValue DetectorID::getFieldValue(const std::string& fieldName) {
00072         return fieldValues_[fieldMap_[fieldName]->getIndex()];
00073     }

00075     void DetectorID::setFieldList(IDField::IDFieldList* fieldList) {
00076         // Set the list of fields.
00077         this->fieldList_ = fieldList;
00078 
00079         // Reinitialize data structures.
00080         init();
00081     }
00082 
00083     void DetectorID::init() {
00084 
00085         // Fill map of name to field info.
00086         fieldMap_.clear();
00087         for (IDField::IDFieldList::iterator it = fieldList_->begin(); it != fieldList_->end(); it++) {
00088             fieldMap_[(*it)->getFieldName()] = *it;
00089         }
00090 
00091         // Resize array to hold the correct number of field values.
00092         this->fieldValues_.resize(fieldList_->size());
00093     }
